title: TEST POST BY ADMIN
author: Seun Matt

post:
Yes and it’s true, Jesus really loves you. His love for you is the only reason He gave his life for you on the cross of Calvary. Jesus died so that you can be re-connected to your Maker, the Creator of all things, through his Holy Spirit that you will receive freely when you give your life to Jesus. Giving your life to Jesus is simple. It means acknowledging Jesus as your Lord and personal saviour.
In essence, you are accepting what Jesus did for you, the entire package of salvation for man to be reconciled to God. When you accept Jesus as your Lord and personal saviour, you become God’s son (John 1:12; Gal. 3:26) and have direct access to God himself through Jesus Christ.Alright, what do I have to do to be Born Again? It’s simple, just say the following confession with believe in your heart. If you confess with your mouth, "Jesus is Lord," and believe in your heart that God raised him from the dead, you will be saved. For it is with your heart that you believe and are justified, and it is with your mouth that you confess and are saved (Rom 10:9-10). “Lord Jesus, thank you for your sacrifice for me on the cross of Calvary. I am really sorry for all my sins. I confess you today as my Lord and personal saviour, come into my life and take over totally. Thank you Lord, in Jesus name have I prayed” Yes! You did it! Welcome to the family of God. Just like a new born baby, you need to be taught in the way of the Lord and this process is called discipleship. Take a step of faith now and subscribe for the discipleship programme below
